alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:14PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Huerfano, north central Las Animas, and eastern Pueblo Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 212 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Pueblo Depot to 20 miles northwest of Delhi to 6 miles east of Walsenburg. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Damaging winds could extend well ahead of thunderstorms. Locations impacted include... Eastern Pueblo, Walsenburg, Boone, Avondale and Pueblo Depot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
